languages.text: Возмездие, что Ноктюрн Забвения сулил Вольному Торговцу, свершилось, когда отчаянные мстители народа эльдаров обрушились на протекторат фон Валанциус. Несколько трупп арлекинов, шедшие с ними, сыграли на Янусе чудовищную и завораживающую кровавую "Мелодию углей, в ночи угасших", пронизанную скорбью и гневом драматурга в рогатой маске.
languages.translation_comment: Мы перебили эльдар на Кетцале и убили Занни

languages.text: The retribution that Nocturne of Oblivion promised the Rogue Trader arrived when relentless Aeldari avengers swept down on the von Valancius protectorate. In their wake, several Harlequin Troupes performed the monstrous and mesmerisingly bloody Melody of Coals Fading in the Night that bathed Janus in the sorrow and fury of the playwright in a horned mask.
languages.original_text: Возмездие, что Ноктюрн Забвения сулил Вольному Торговцу, свершилось, когда отчаянные мстители народа эльдаров обрушились на протекторат фон Валанциус. Несколько трупп арлекинов, шедшие с ними, сыграли на Янусе чудовищную и завораживающую кровавую "Мелодию углей, в ночи угасших", пронизанную скорбью и гневом драматурга в рогатой маске.

traits.locale_text: Nocturne of Oblivion died by the hand of the Rogue Trader. But his memory was honoured when feverish avengers of Aeldari people swept down the von Vanalcius protectorate. Several accompanying Harlequin Troupes played a monstrous and mesmerising gory Melody of Coals Fading in the Night on Janus in memory of perished Aeldari.

Nocturne of Oblivion died by the hand of the Rogue Trader. But his memory was honoured when feverish avengers of Aeldari people swept down the von Vanalcius protectorate. Several accompanying Harlequin Troupes played a monstrous and mesmerising gory Melody of Coals Fading in the Night on Janus in memory of perished Aeldari.

Nocturne of Oblivion died by the hand of the Rogue Trader, but his memory was honoured by feverish Aeldari avengers who swept down on the von Valancius protectorate. In their wake, several Harlequin Troupes played the monstrous and mesmerisingly bloody Melody of Coals Fading in the Night on Janus in memory of the departed Aeldari.

Nocturne of Oblivion died by the hand of the Rogue Trader, but his memory was honoured by feverish Aeldari avengers who swept down on the von Valancius protectorate. In their wake, several Harlequin Troupes played the monstrous and mesmerisingly bloody Melody of Coals Fading in the Night on Janus in memory of the departed Aeldari.

The retribution that Nocturne of Oblivion promised the Rogue Trader arrived when relentless Aeldari avengers swept down on the von Valancius protectorate. In their wake, several Harlequin Troupes performed the monstrous and mesmerisingly bloody Melody of Coals Fading in the Night that bathed Janus in the sorrow and fury of the playwright in a horned mask.

The retribution that Nocturne of Oblivion promised the Rogue Trader arrived when relentless Aeldari avengers swept down on the von Valancius protectorate. In their wake, several Harlequin Troupes performed the monstrous and mesmerisingly bloody Melody of Coals Fading in the Night that bathed Janus in the sorrow and fury of the playwright in a horned mask.

languages.text: 遗忘夜曲向行商浪人承诺过的报复到来了，一群无情的艾达灵族复仇者袭击了整个冯·瓦兰修斯王朝。屠杀结束之后，几支丑角剧团在加努斯演奏了可怕而迷人的血腥曲调《煤渣逝于夜色之中》，将整颗行星淹没在了剧作者的悲恸与愤怒之中。
languages.original_text: The retribution that Nocturne of Oblivion promised the Rogue Trader arrived when relentless Aeldari avengers swept down on the von Valancius protectorate. In their wake, several Harlequin Troupes performed the monstrous and mesmerisingly bloody Melody of Coals Fading in the Night that bathed Janus in the sorrow and fury of the playwright in a horned mask.

traits.locale_text: 遗忘夜曲向行商浪人承诺过的报复到来了，一群无情的艾达灵族复仇者袭击了整个冯·瓦兰修斯王朝。屠杀结束之后，几支丑角剧团在加努斯演奏了可怕而迷人的血腥曲调《煤渣逝于夜色之中》，将整颗行星淹没在了剧作者的悲恸与愤怒之中。

languages.text: Die Vergeltung, die Nocturne des Nichts {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} versprochen hatte, kam, als skrupellose Aeldari-Rächer über das Protektorat derer von Valancius herfielen. Ihnen folgten mehrere Harlekin-Ensembles, die die die monströse und verstörend blutige 'Melodie der Kohle, die des nachts auf Janus verblasst' im Sinne des Verseschmiedes mit der gehörnten Maske aufführten.
languages.original_text: The retribution that Nocturne of Oblivion promised the Rogue Trader arrived when relentless Aeldari avengers swept down on the von Valancius protectorate. In their wake, several Harlequin Troupes performed the monstrous and mesmerisingly bloody Melody of Coals Fading in the Night that bathed Janus in the sorrow and fury of the playwright in a horned mask.

traits.locale_text: Die Vergeltung, die Nocturne des Nichts {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} versprochen hatte, kam, als skrupellose Aeldari-Rächer über das Protektorat derer von Valancius herfielen. Ihnen folgten mehrere Harlekin-Ensembles, die die die monströse und verstörend blutige 'Melodie der Kohle, die des nachts auf Janus verblasst' im Sinne des Verseschmiedes mit der gehörnten Maske aufführten.

languages.text: Le châtiment promis {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} par le Nocturne de l'Oubli arriva lorsque des Aeldaris assoiffés de vengeance fondirent sur le protectorat von Valancius. Tout en perpétrant leur massacre, les troupes des Arlequins jouèrent l'hypnotique « Mélodie nocturne des braises mourantes » qui plongea Janus dans le chagrin et la fureur du dramaturge au masque à cornes.
languages.original_text: The retribution that Nocturne of Oblivion promised the Rogue Trader arrived when relentless Aeldari avengers swept down on the von Valancius protectorate. In their wake, several Harlequin Troupes performed the monstrous and mesmerisingly bloody Melody of Coals Fading in the Night that bathed Janus in the sorrow and fury of the playwright in a horned mask.

traits.locale_text: Le châtiment promis {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} par le Nocturne de l'Oubli arriva lorsque des Aeldaris assoiffés de vengeance fondirent sur le protectorat von Valancius. Tout en perpétrant leur massacre, les troupes des Arlequins jouèrent l'hypnotique « Mélodie nocturne des braises mourantes » qui plongea Janus dans le chagrin et la fureur du dramaturge au masque à cornes.

languages.text: Las represalias que Nocturno del Olvido había prometido a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se materializaron cuando los incansables vengadores Aeldari asaltaron el protectorado von Valancius. A su paso, varias compañías de Arlequines interpretaron la monstruosa e hipnóticamente cautivadora Melodía de Ascuas Extinguiéndose en la Noche, bañando Janus en el dolor y la furia del dramaturgo de la máscara astada.
languages.original_text: The retribution that Nocturne of Oblivion promised the Rogue Trader arrived when relentless Aeldari avengers swept down on the von Valancius protectorate. In their wake, several Harlequin Troupes performed the monstrous and mesmerisingly bloody Melody of Coals Fading in the Night that bathed Janus in the sorrow and fury of the playwright in a horned mask.

traits.locale_text: Las represalias que Nocturno del Olvido había prometido a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se materializaron cuando los incansables vengadores Aeldari asaltaron el protectorado von Valancius. A su paso, varias compañías de Arlequines interpretaron la monstruosa e hipnóticamente cautivadora Melodía de Ascuas Extinguiéndose en la Noche, bañando Janus en el dolor y la furia del dramaturgo de la máscara astada.

languages.text: 忘却のノクターンが自由開拓者に約束した報復は、容赦なきアエルダリの復讐者たちがフォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領へと押し寄せたことで果たされた。彼らの後を追い、いくつかのハーレクィン団がヤヌスで怪物的かつ魅惑的で血なまぐさい「夜に消えゆく石炭の旋律」を演奏した。それは、角のついた仮面をみにつけた劇作家の嘆きと怒りにヤヌスを浴した。
languages.original_text: The retribution that Nocturne of Oblivion promised the Rogue Trader arrived when relentless Aeldari avengers swept down on the von Valancius protectorate. In their wake, several Harlequin Troupes performed the monstrous and mesmerisingly bloody Melody of Coals Fading in the Night that bathed Janus in the sorrow and fury of the playwright in a horned mask.

traits.locale_text: 忘却のノクターンが自由開拓者に約束した報復は、容赦なきアエルダリの復讐者たちがフォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領へと押し寄せたことで果たされた。彼らの後を追い、いくつかのハーレクィン団がヤヌスで怪物的かつ魅惑的で血なまぐさい「夜に消えゆく石炭の旋律」を演奏した。それは、角のついた仮面をみにつけた劇作家の嘆きと怒りにヤヌスを浴した。

languages.text: Nisyan Noktürnü'nün Hür Tacir'e vadettiği intikam, von Valancius protektorasını silip süpüren insafsız Aeldari intikamcıları ile birlikte geldi. Gelişleriyle birlikte birkaç Arleken Kumpanyası, büyüleyici derecede kanlı ve dehşet verici bir Gece Solan Kömürler Melodisi performansı sergiledi ve Janus'u, boynuzlu bir maske takan oyun yazarının hüznüyle öfkesine boğdu.
languages.original_text: The retribution that Nocturne of Oblivion promised the Rogue Trader arrived when relentless Aeldari avengers swept down on the von Valancius protectorate. In their wake, several Harlequin Troupes performed the monstrous and mesmerisingly bloody Melody of Coals Fading in the Night that bathed Janus in the sorrow and fury of the playwright in a horned mask.

traits.locale_text: Nisyan Noktürnü'nün Hür Tacir'e vadettiği misilleme, von Valancius protektorasını silip süpüren insafsız Aeldari intikamcıları ile birlikte geldi. Gelişleriyle birlikte birkaç Arleken Kumpanyası, büyüleyici derecede kanlı ve dehşet verici bir Gecede Solan Kömürler Melodisi performansı sergiledi ve Janus'u boynuzlu bir maske takan oyun yazarının hüznüne ve öfkesine boğdu.

languages.translation_comment: Мы перебили эльдар на Кетцале и убили Занни
